# visibleItems

**Instance Property**

The identifiers of the currently visible items in the section snapshot.

## Declaration

```swift
var visibleItems: [Any] { get }
```

## Accessing items

- **items**: The identifiers of all items in the section snapshot.
- **rootItems**: The identifiers of the items at the top level of the section snapshot’s hierarchy.

items.description: The identifiers of all items in the section snapshot.
items.name: items

items.description: The identifiers of the items at the top level of the section snapshot’s hierarchy.
items.name: rootItems
